What's a V11 reference number?

It's the 16 digit number on the reminder letter that we send out when your tax disc is due for renewal.

I don't have the reminder, just the V5C (log book)

You can still buy your tax disc online using the vehicle's registration number and V5C number instead.

Don't do this if you've recently purchased your vehicle and don't yet have the full V5C (the green slip alone is not enough).
